title: Catalog, M&Co: M&Co Labs Old Faithful Catalog, 1990
title_raw: M&Co: M&Co Labs Old Faithful Catalog
dimensions:
9.5 x 6 cm (3 3/4 x 2 3/8 in.), closed
9.5 x 12 cm (3 3/4 x 4 3/4 in.), opened
creditline: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & Co.
description:
A view of tourists facing the geyser, Old Faithful, Yellowstone National Park, spans the back and front covers. Against a background of an evergreen forest, a casually dressed crowd stands on a stretch of lawn or sits on benches beyond. The site is identified on the upper left of the back cover. To read the catalog title, M&Co Labs, imprinted on the geyser in the center of the front cover, one turns the object to a horizontal position. 

The thirty page catalog features the M&Co Labs watches collection, divided into four sections, labeled black, gold, silver and pocket, each introduced on a solid color page. The watches are photographed one to a page, centered on the page and attached to their wristbands, accompanied by the product name imprinted in black on a white band at the bottom of the page. Several pages of explanatory text are interspersed. Just before the last section, a photograph of Stonehenge, labeled Not for Sale on the white band, is inserted.

tombstone.epitaph:
Catalog, M&Co: M&Co Labs Old Faithful Catalog, 1990. Offset lithography. 
Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & Co.. 1993-151-426
